$eref.description: Sent whenever a classic referral event happens
$eref.title: Classic Referral Webhook Schema

___dateModified.description: The date this referral was last modified for any reason (e.g. converted, reward added, etc.)
___dateModified.title: Date Referral Modified

___referred.description: The referred user who initiated this referral
___referred.title: Referred User

___referrerReward.description: The rewardId of the classic program referrer user's reward if available (Classic-Only)
___referrerReward.title: Referrer Reward

___referredReward.description: The rewardId of the classic program referred user's reward if available (Classic-Only)
___referredReward.title: Referred Reward

___dateUserModified.description: The date a user was added to or removed from the referral (e.g. removed as a result of user deletion)
___dateUserModified.title: Date User Modified

___dateReferralStarted.description: The date this referral was created
___dateReferralStarted.title: Date Referral Started

___referrer.description: The referrer user in who initiated this referral
___referrer.title: Referrer User

___programId.description: The Id of the program this code was created for
___programId.title: Program Id

___referrerUser.description: The userId of the referrer user (Classic-Only)
___referrerUser.title: Referrer User

___moderationStatus.description: The referral fraud moderation status for the classic program (Classic-Only)
___moderationStatus.title: Moderation Status

___referredModerationStatus.description: The moderation status for the referred user in the classic program (Classic-Only)
___referredModerationStatus.title: Referred Moderation Status

___referrerModerationStatus.description: The referral moderation status for the referrer user classic program (Classic-Only)
___referrerModerationStatus.title: Referrer Moderation Status

___dateReferralPaid.description: The date the referral was marked as paid (Classic-Only)
___dateReferralPaid.title: Date Referral Paid

___referredUser.description: The userId of the referred user (Classic-Only)
___referredUser.title: Referred User

___fraudSignals.description: A set of fraud flags generated for the classic referral program (Classic-Only)
___fraudSignals.title: Fraud Signals

___dateModerated.description: The date the referral was moderated (Classic-Only)
___dateModerated.title: Date Moderated

$eref.description: Sent whenever a referral event happens and the classic program is disabled
$eref.title: Classic Disabled Referral Webhook Schema

___dateModified.title: Date Referral Modified

___referred.description: The referred user who initiated this referral
___referred.title: Referred User

___dateUserModified.description: The date a user was added to or removed from the referral (e.g. removed as a result of user deletion)
___dateUserModified.title: Date User Modified

___dateReferralStarted.description: The date this referral was created
___dateReferralStarted.title: Date Referral Started

___referrer.description: The referrer user in who initiated this referral
___referrer.title: Referrer User

___programId.description: The Id of the program this code was created for
___programId.title: Program Id

title: Referral Data Webhook Schema
